name: Ahmed Wazir
title: Real Estate Agent
bio: A licensed real estate professional in Dubai who specializes in guiding international investors into the local market. Fluent in English, Arabic, Hindi, and Urdu, he makes complex property decisions simple and accessible for clients from diverse backgrounds.

name: Sarah Mitchell
title: Senior Property Consultant
bio: With over 15 years of experience in luxury real estate, Sarah specializes in high-end residential properties. Her deep market knowledge and client-first approach have made her a trusted advisor for discerning buyers worldwide.

name: Omar Hassan
title: Investment Specialist
bio: Omar brings a wealth of experience in real estate investment and portfolio management. He helps clients identify high-yield opportunities and build long-term wealth through strategic property investments.
